review_data.title: A Surprisingly Delicious Lunch!
review_data.content: I happened to be in the area and randomly chose this restaurant to have lunch. What a fantastic surprise: the food was delicious! The restaurant has a simple decor and a spacious outdoor terrace. I highly recommend this restaurant if you are looking for tasty,...More

review_data.title: Nice food and pleasant service
review_data.content: I discovered this restaurant with a friend. The food was really tasty and the people nice. We had some mezze and a dish with eggplants and chickpeas that was delicious.
